frontend ya listo 1.2 Auth Guard en Router 2h Redirect autom√°tico login ‚Üî dashboard 1.3 Rate Limiting 3h express-rate-limit para proteger API 1.4 Eliminar FoundationReadyScreen 1h Reemplazar con SplashScreen + auth check Subtotal Fase 1: ~8 horas FASE 2: FUNCIONALIDAD CORE Prioridad: üü† ALTA # Tarea Esfuerzo Descripci√≥n 2.1 Profile Page 4h Ver/editar perfil usuario 2.2 Settings Page 3h Preferencias, notificaciones, tema 2.3 Backend Profile/Settings API 3h PUT /users/profile, GET/PUT /users/settings 2.4 Goal Rankings completo 2h Verificar y completar leaderboard 2.5 Push Notifications Backend 4h FCM handlers, token storage, send logic Subtotal Fase 2: ~16 horas FASE 3: ROBUSTEZ Prioridad: üü° MEDIA # Tarea Esfuerzo Descripci√≥n 3.1 Offline Support (Hive/SQLite) 6h Cache local, sync queue, conflict resolution 3.2 Database Migrations 3h migrate-mongo o similar 3.3 API Versioning 2h /api/v1/ prefix + versioning middleware 3.4 Swagger/OpenAPI 4h swagger-jsdoc + swagger-ui-express 3.5 Error Tracking 2h Sentry integration (frontend + backend) Subtotal Fase 3: ~17 horas FASE 4: DEVOPS & CALIDAD Prioridad: üü° MEDIA # Tarea Esfuerzo Descripci√≥n 4.1 Dockerfile Backend 2h Multi-stage build, optimized 4.2 Dockerfile Frontend (Web) 2h Flutter web build + nginx 4.3 docker-compose.yml 2h Backend + MongoDB + Redis (opcional) 4.4 GitHub Actions CI 3h Lint, test, build on PR 4.5 GitHub Actions CD 3h Deploy to staging/prod Subtotal Fase 4: ~12 horas FASE 5: TESTING Prioridad: üî¥ ALTA (para producci√≥n) # Tarea Esfuerzo Descripci√≥n 5.1 Unit Tests Backend 6h Services, validators, utils 5.2 Integration Tests Backend 4h API endpoints con supertest 5.3 BLoC Tests Frontend 4h Cada bloc con bloc_test 5.4 Widget Tests Frontend 4h Componentes cr√≠ticos 5.5 E2E Tests 6h Flujos completos (integration_test) Subtotal Fase 5: ~24 horas FASE 6: POLISH & UX Prioridad:

epics.title: Frontend: Replace FoundationReadyScreen with Splash + Auth Check
